mapper.select: SELECT s_account.id, s_account.createdTime, s_account.billingPlanId, s_account.subdomain, s_account.accountName, s_account.status, s_account.paymentMethod, s_account.pricing, s_account.pricingEffectFrom, s_account.pricingEffectTo, s_account.sitename, s_account.logoPath, s_account.defaultTimezone, s_account.defaultCurrencyId, s_account.defaultYYMMDDFormat, s_account.defaultMMDDFormat, s_account.defaultHumanDateFormat, s_account.defaultLanguageTag, s_account.logoPath, s_account.faviconPath, s_account.displayEmailPublicly, s_billing_plan.id AS plan_id, s_billing_plan.billingType AS plan_billingType, s_billing_plan.numUsers AS plan_numUsers, s_billing_plan.volume AS plan_volume, s_billing_plan.numProjects AS plan_numProjects, s_billing_plan.pricing AS plan_pricing, s_billing_plan.description AS plan_description FROM s_account LEFT OUTER JOIN s_billing_plan ON (s_billing_plan.id=s_account.billingPlanId) WHERE s_account.id = #{accountId,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
SELECT DISTINCT s_account.subdomain FROM s_account, s_user_account WHERE s_user_account.username=#{username, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND s_user_account.accountId=s_account.id

SELECT s_account.id, s_account.createdTime, s_account.billingPlanId,s_account.subdomain, s_account.accountName, s_account.status, s_account.paymentMethod, s_account.pricing, s_account.pricingEffectFrom, s_account.pricingEffectTo, s_account.reminderStatus, s_account.sitename, s_account.logoPath, s_account.defaultTimezone, s_account.defaultCurrencyId, s_account.defaultYYMMDDFormat, s_account.defaultMMDDFormat, s_account.defaultHumanDateFormat, s_account.defaultLanguageTag, s_account.displayEmailPublicly, s_billing_plan.id AS billingPlan_id, s_billing_plan.billingType AS billingPlan_billingType, s_billing_plan.numUsers AS billingPlan_numUsers, s_billing_plan.volume AS billingPlan_volume, s_billing_plan.numProjects AS billingPlan_numProjects, s_billing_plan.pricing AS billingPlan_pricing, s_billing_plan.description AS billingPlan_description, s_user.username AS owner_username, s_user.email AS owner_email, s_user.firstname AS owner_firstname, s_user.lastname AS owner_lastname FROM s_account LEFT OUTER JOIN s_billing_plan ON (s_billing_plan.id=s_account.billingPlanId) LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user_account ON (s_account.id=s_user_account.accountId AND isAccountOwner="1") LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user ON (s_user_account.username=s_user.username) WHERE s_account.status="Trial" AND s_billing_plan.billingType <> 'Free'
